long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🐒 Monkey Mart - Your Ultimate Relaxation Haven on Chrome! 🌟

Embark on a chillaxed journey with Monkey Mart - the ultimate relaxation game that's now available for FREE on the Chrome Web Store! 🆓🌐

🌟 Tranquil Features:

🍌 Immerse yourself in a soothing pixelated mart filled with adorable monkeys!
🛒 Enjoy a laid-back shopping experience without the hustle and bustle!
🌈 Customize your mart, collect cute items, and create your own oasis of relaxation!
🎉 Challenge yourself with calming quests and unlock new serene features!
🚀 Why Opt for Monkey Mart - Relax Game?
Experience the joy of a tranquil shopping spree where the delightful antics of pixelated monkeys make every moment a chillaxed escape! 🐵🌟

🕹️ How to Play:

🌍 Install Monkey Mart - Relax Game from the Chrome Web Store.
🍌 Manage your pixelated mart, collecting adorable items at your own pace.
🌟 Customize, unwind, and create your ultimate relaxation haven in Monkey Mart!
